text:
@marcorubio Do you understand what the “19” in Covid19 means? 

🗣2019 was *SIX MONTHS AGO!

Republicans betrayed us all. They put their party over American constituents lives! 

#GOPBetrayedAmerica 

#GOPCorruptionOverCountry #GOPCowards
